content: I would like to introduce @Owen Griffiths to the group who was interested in working on package managers so I asked them why not jump aboard and help us with the project

I have been working on and talking incessantly about dependency resolution ... since Jan 2018. It is so lovely to have people to talk to that are interested! If you have a question or topic, please feel free to ask!
Welcome! Feel free to ask any questions you have in this stream. You can also ping me privately if you prefer, either here or on Discord (Gwentology#8908).
